document_data.name: Ahlysaaria Yril'Lysaen
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ahlysaaria Yril'Lysaen''' was a female [[drow]] [[cleric]] of [[Lolth]] and a member of the mercantile [[House Lysaen]] of the city of [[Karsoluthiyl]] in [[1370 DR]].{{Cite dragon/227/The Reports from Undermountain|17}}

She was chosen to lead a group of three other priestesses and a 32-strong hunting party of her house to establish a hold on Level Two of [[Undermountain]], with the goal of rebuilding an ancient slave-trading route to the surface, in order to bypass the route used by [[House Tanor'Thal]], the ruling house of Karsoluthiyl.
document_data.Relationships: Ahlyssaria had an aunt named [[Aranea Srix'Lysaen]].
